Name: Capt. Injustice
Text: And I wasn't even looking at the controls.

Name: Christa
Text: Oh wow, Captain Injustice, you're so cool!

Name: Leo
Text: Uhh.. Sir? Can we get to the mission briefing, please?

Name: Capt. Injustice
Text: Tsk.. Fine. Your mission is to retrieve an Ancient Weapon to the cave East of here.

Name: Capt. Injustice
Text: It's going to be a tough mission, many soldiers have already died in attempt.

Name: Capt. Injustice
Text: But I know you can do it, cause you're the legendary Commander Christa Baron!

Name: Capt. Injustice
Text: Oh.. And please take care of Lieutenant here, it's his first mission with our team.

Name: Leo
Text: I can take care of myself, Sir.
